original_text: This man was seized by the Jews and was about to be killed by them when I came upon them with the soldiers and rescued him, having learned that he was a Roman citizen.
korean_text: 이 사람이 유대인들에게 잡혀 죽게 된 것을 내가 로마 사람인 줄 들어 알고 군대를 거느리고 가서 구원하여다가

sentences.original_text: This man was seized by the Jews
and was about to be killed by them
when I came upon them with the soldiers
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 군사들과 함께 그들에게 갔을 때

sentences.original_text: having learned that he was a Roman citizen
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그는 로마 시민이라는 것을 알았기 때문입니다
